name: Cursed Colors
description:
Cursed Colors is an arcade game, where your main objective is to destroy enemies by clicking on them using their weaknesses in your attacks!
Every color has a contrary one, which will be very effective by dealing more damage.


Every time you end a run you will come back stronger!
Use essences to buy upgrades at the shop.


Try out different combinations of upgrades and characters in order to optimize your favorite playstyle.

Content

  • Thematic stages with different enemies and backgrounds.
  • 5 unlockable characters with different skills.
  • Original Soundtracks for each stage.
  • Challenging boss fights.
